name: Feeble Fire
description:
:: Important Notice! :: If you're unable to extract the game file, try installing the game through the itch.io app instead. This should solve the issue. You can also try downloading the 'FeebleFireAlt' version of the game.  :: Overview ::

Feeble Fire is a small action-adventure title, lightly inspired by a famously unforgiving and enigmatic game from a certain Japanese game studio. I developed it for "My First Game Jam: Summer 2018". I really hope you'll enjoy it!

:: Credits :: 

Voice Acting (In Order of Appearance):

Archmage Swigismund: Dominic Walker @Someguydom

Minerva The Red Hag: CaitlinRC @CaitlinRC

3D Models:

Various models from "Baba Yaga’s Hut" by Inuciian -- sketchfab.com/Inuciian

Island and tree models by BOXOPHOBIC -- assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/free-skybox-cubemap-extended-107400

Mage character models by OmegaGrim -- omegagrim.itch.io/lowpoly-mage-asset

2D Art:

Spell Icons by J. W. Bjerk (eleazzaar) -- www.jwbjerk.com/art //opengameart.org/content/painterly-spell-icons-part-1

Game Design/Writing/Coding/Graphics Programming and Everything Else -- @LemonBalmGames

:: Controls ::

Keyboard:

WSAD - Character Movement

Mouse - Camera Movement

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Right Mouse Button - Dash

Q - Heal Ability

Space - Super Jump

E - Initiate Dialogue

Controller (Untested!): 

Left Stick - Character Movement

Right Stick -  Camera Movement

Right Bumper - Attack

Left Bumper - Dash

Right Trigger - Heal Ability

Left Trigger - Super Jump

X - Initiate Dialogue

:: System Requirements ::

Game runs flawlessly on this configuration:

CPU: i7-4771

GPU: Radeon RX 470

RAM: 8GB 

I suspect this rig is a giant overkill given the art style of the game. I'd really appreciate your feedback regarding this. Tell me how the game runs on your system in the comment section so I can update the game page with an accurate list of minimum specs.
